AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Delyn glassworker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Glassworker's Hall of the St. Delyn canton. [PAWN_nameDef] was a bit annoyed when [PAWN_pronoun] realised they meant that kind of glass, but that did explain the pay, and [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't going to turn down the work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: St. Olms dyer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of many that found work in the Tailors and Dyers Hall of the St. Olms canton. [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed working with all the dyes, in all their different colours, although there were a few colours [PAWN_nameDef] didn't much care for.
